question.title: Using libraries with IntelliJ
question.body:
I'm trying to integrate a directory scanner with my project. I found two implementations but I can't use them in my project. My project is built with Maven.

DirectoryScanner class is in two libraries:

  • org.apache.tools.ant.DirectoryScanner; and

  • org.codehaus.plexus.util.

I assume they are the same. But I can't import either of them.

I looked up Apache.tools.ant in some Intellij documentation. This link is apparently Ant plugin for a build environment. Which I gather I don't need and don't want, because I am using Maven.

Neither of the obvious things works:

I looked here to no avail:

Update: Thanks ViJay. That looks really promising. The Apache scanner was the first one I found, with some examples.

But when the POM file is edited, this pops up.

and following the link in blue is not helpful.

Update: Using Dependency dialog in the POM, the following was added:

But that was not found automatically.

But a google search found this:

So, it looks like I have found the library on GitHub. But what do I download? and where do I put it? and how do I tell Intellij where to find it. I could look up documentation for this possibly, but I don't know what to search for. What is this process of finding, downloading and telling the IDE about a library? thx.

Still No Joy in Finding Libraries

Here are a pile of "Reproducible Builds" of what looks like the correct Library, but where is the required download and how to use it.

https://github.com/jvm-repo-rebuild/reproducible-central/blob/master/content/org/codehaus/plexus/plexus-utils/README.md

Is the library a JAR file? There are a pile of folders here, where is the JAR or whatever it is to download?

Once downloaded, the project needs to be set to find it? How to do that? Thx

UPDATE: 22 April 2025 I'm working on another project that needs Directoryscanner and I'm trying to use the answer here and it is stuck.

POM updated to add dep:

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.codehaus.plexus</groupId>
  <artifactId>plexus-utils</artifactId>
  <version>4.0.0</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>

module-info.java has line requires plexus.utils;

class has import: import org.codehaus.plexus.util.DirectoryScanner;

But Plexus in red in java and module info and I can'tg figure out what to do to make it not-red. before it just happened. BUT NOT NOW. Anybody got an idea?

Code is here: version is "STUCK - can't import directoryscanner"
